channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Saturday Mash-Up! Live
channel.desc: The stars of Malory Towers drop in to talk about their final series, Adam and Callum join Joe to celebrate the return of Bro?s in Control, and there?s music from ili. Expect cartoon fun from Grizzy and SpongeBob Squarepants, plus Bog Off, Senseless and lots of slime.
